definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: That's especially true if your employer maintains an on-site charging station.
sentences.chinese: 当你老板配备了一台一站式充电站时更是如此。

sentences.english: I found, integrating many of the world search engine, a one-stop search site.
sentences.chinese: 给我搜，整合全球众多搜索引擎的一站式搜索网站。

sentences.english: A large one-stop merchandiser will be built here next year.
sentences.chinese: 明年这里将建成一个大型的一站式大卖场。

sentences.english: This is your destination, and one-stop baby bath towel, you have been looking for.
sentences.chinese: 这是您的一站式目的地，浴巾宝贝，你一直在寻找的。

sentences.english: It will be a large church wedding.
sentences.chinese: 明年这里将建成一个大型的一站式大卖场。

sentences.english: "A station type real estate operating service", is different meeds which suit the customer.
sentences.chinese: “一站式地产经营服务”，是切合客户的不同需要。

sentences.english: The most professional garden landscape design, one-stop design and construction services.
sentences.chinese: 最专业的庭院景观设计，一站式设计施工服务。

sentences.english: Ucool Services Pte Ltd, your one stop Aircon service hub !

sentences.english: The high level hospital information system makes One-stop Service possible.
sentences.chinese: 高水平的医院信息系统为一站式服务提供了保障。

sentences.english: A model offers one-stop shopping for information about a system.
sentences.chinese: 模型提供关于系统的一站式信息选定。

sentences.english: Since no two customers have identical janitorial needs, HLES cleaning programs and tailored for each individual client.
sentences.chinese: 我们会了解客户需要，提供一站式的清洁服务。

sentences.english: LeepPet Holding Corp. is the most professional system to provide one stop service for your pets.
sentences.chinese: 乐宠控股是中国宠物行业最专业的一站式服务体系。

sentences.english: Aoyagi offers a one-stop service for absorption refrigerators.
sentences.chinese: 对于热吸收式冰箱，青柳提供了一站式的服务。

sentences.english: This review of the winners serves as a one-stop-shop for everything that's hot in the field.
sentences.chinese: 本文的冠军作为一站式的一切领域很热。

sentences.english: For the fashion industry to provide a-Stop services.
sentences.chinese: 为服装界提供了一站式的服务。

sentences.english: Finally, designed the ideal G2B "one-window" business process.
sentences.chinese: 最后，设计理想化的G2B“一站式”业务流程。

definition: to facilitate/expedite/make convenient and fast/speed up
lit. not putting a foot outside/to stay at home
